Binary: firehol, firehol-doc, fireqos, fireqos-doc, firehol-tools, firehol-tools-doc, firehol-common
Build-Depends-Indep: libxml2-utils, texlive-base, texlive-latex-extra, texlive-latex-recommended, texlive-fonts-recommended, lmodern, pandoc, kmod, iptables (>= 1.8.2), iproute2, ipset, iprange, nfacct, tcpdump, inetutils-ping | iputils-ping, traceroute, procps, curl, wget, whois, jq, unzip, git, graphviz, screen
Package-List: firehol deb net optional arch=all firehol-common deb net optional arch=all firehol-doc deb doc optional arch=all firehol-tools deb net optional arch=all firehol-tools-doc deb doc optional arch=all fireqos deb net optional arch=all fireqos-doc deb doc optional arch=all
